item.description:
Seaside Late Afternoon Hike

Monday, Sept., 5th. 3pm. to 5pm.

Ordione State Park

rt. 1, Rye NH., 03870

The boat ramp, not the main entrance.

A Dog & Child Friendly Event.

Rain, cold, heavy winds, cancel this events.

Host: Steve Obermiller ( Steve O ) 603-491-1962  ob@tds.net

Carpooling from Nashua and Manchester

Steve O. wrote:

        Bring your friends, dogs, kids, and join me. After I welcome the troops home from overseas at Pease Airport.  I will be needing a good walk, and along the sea will make it better. We will meet at 3 pm., at the boat ramp, for an easy 2 hour hike around Ordione Point. This is the opening to Portsmouth Harbor.  Where there are trails along the sea and through the historical sites.  Afterward, if people would like to get something to eat?  We can go down route 1, and sit by the sea and have dinner or drinks.

Please call me ASAP, and let me know. If you will be joining us for dinner also? If you would just like to do the hike? The RSVP for this event will do. See you there.
item.how_to_find_us: look 4 the sign on my van.

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: Seaside Late Afternoon Hike
